pageTitle: Itinerary for Sunday, June 23, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Toronto, Ontario

2:00 p.m.  The Prime Minister will participate in the Toronto Pride Parade.

Notes for media:

  • Pooled coverage of close proximity, and open coverage along the route for Toronto Pride accredited media
  • Media who wish to cover the event and are not already accredited with Toronto Pride should contact alex@pridetoronto.com.  

Media appearances

2:15 p.m.  A brief interview with the Prime Minister will air on CP24.

2:30 p.m.  A brief interview with the Prime Minister will air on 103.9 Proud FM.
